text: "Hideaway" is a song by Delays, released as the second and last single from their second album You See Colours. The single reached number 35 on the UK Singles Chart when released in May 2006. ==Track listing== All songs written by Greg Gilbert unless otherwise stated. *CD 1 RTRADSCD336 #"Hideaway" – 3:48 #"Broken Pylons" – 3:35 *CD 2 RTRADSCDX336 #"Hideaway" – 3:48 #"Valentine" (Torch Team Remix) – 6:11 #"Aglow Like Honey" – 3:13 #"Hideaway" (video) *7" RTRADS336 #"Hideaway" – 3:48 #"Beautiful Boy" (John Lennon) – 3:37 Category:2006 singles Category:Delays songs Category:Rough Trade Records singles Category:2006 songs
title: Hideaway (Delays song)
